articles.description: James Trafford made an injury-time penalty save to ensure Curtis Jones’s deflected goal was enough to win the trophy

articles.author: Ben Gardner
articles.title: Ashes 2023: Match referee Chris Broad deletes tweet, reportedly gets rebuked by ICC for posting anti-David Warner meme - Wisden
articles.description: Match referee Chris Broad has deleted a tweet and reportedly been rebuked by the ICC for posting a meme that poked fun at David Warner
articles.content: Match referee Chris Broad has deleted a tweet and reportedly been rebuked by the ICC for posting a meme that poked fun at David Warner and the hold Chris Broads son, Stuart, has over him in the Ashes… [+1716 chars]
